title: Watch, ICC Men's T20 World Cup: Sean Paul and Kes combine to create tournament's official anthem
content: The ICC Men's T20 World Cup Anthem from @duttypaul & @Kestheband is here - and it’s Out Of This World! 🌎 🏏See if you can spot some of their friends joining the party @usainbolt, @stafanie07, Shivnarine Chanderpaul, @henrygayle 🤩#T20WorldCup | #OutOfThisWorld pic.twitter.com/jzsCY1GRqa— ICC (@ICC) May 2, 2024
author: Scroll Staff
